Detailed Description

template<class TYPE>
class SAMRAI::pdat::FaceDataFactory< TYPE >

Class FaceDataFactory is a factory class used to allocate new instances of FaceData objects. It is a subclass of the patch data factory class and face data is a subclass of patch data. Both the factory and data classes are templated on the type of the contained object (e.g., double or int).

See also:
pdat::FaceData
pdat::PatchDataFactory

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

template<class TYPE >
SAMRAI::pdat::FaceDataFactory< TYPE >::FaceDataFactory ( int  depth,
const hier::IntVector &  ghosts,
bool  fine_boundary_represents_var 
) [inline]

The constructor for the face data factory class. The ghost cell width, depth (number of components), and fine boundary representation arguments give the defaults for all edge data objects created with this factory. See the FaceVariable<TYPE> class header file for more information.

Precondition:
depth > 0
ghosts.min() >= 0

References SAMRAI::hier::IntVector::min(), and TBOX_ASSERT.

template<class TYPE >
SAMRAI::pdat::FaceDataFactory< TYPE >::~FaceDataFactory (  )  [inline, virtual]

Virtual destructor for the face data factory class.

Member Function Documentation

template<class TYPE >
boost::shared_ptr< hier::PatchDataFactory > SAMRAI::pdat::FaceDataFactory< TYPE >::cloneFactory ( const hier::IntVector &  ghosts  )  [inline, virtual]

Abstract virtual function to clone a patch data factory.

This will return a new instantiation of the abstract factory with the same properties. The properties of the cloned factory can then be changed without modifying the original.

Parameters:
ghosts default ghost cell width for concrete classes created from the factory.
Precondition:
getDim() == ghosts.getDim()

Implements SAMRAI::hier::PatchDataFactory.

References TBOX_ASSERT_OBJDIM_EQUALITY2.

template<class TYPE >
boost::shared_ptr< hier::PatchData > SAMRAI::pdat::FaceDataFactory< TYPE >::allocate ( const hier::Patch &  patch  )  const [inline, virtual]

Virtual factory function to allocate a concrete face data object. The default information about the object (e.g., ghost cell width) is taken from the factory.

Precondition:
getDim() == patch.getDim()

Implements SAMRAI::hier::PatchDataFactory.

References SAMRAI::hier::PatchDataFactory::d_ghosts, SAMRAI::hier::Patch::getBox(), and TBOX_ASSERT_OBJDIM_EQUALITY2.

template<class TYPE >
boost::shared_ptr< hier::BoxGeometry > SAMRAI::pdat::FaceDataFactory< TYPE >::getBoxGeometry ( const hier::Box &  box  )  const [inline, virtual]

Allocate the box geometry object associated with the patch data. This information will be used in the computation of intersections and data dependencies between objects.

Precondition:
getDim() == box.getDim()

Implements SAMRAI::hier::PatchDataFactory.

References SAMRAI::hier::PatchDataFactory::d_ghosts, and TBOX_ASSERT_OBJDIM_EQUALITY2.

template<class TYPE >
int SAMRAI::pdat::FaceDataFactory< TYPE >::getDepth (  )  const [inline]

Get the depth (number of components). This is the depth that will be used in the instantiation of face data objects.

template<class TYPE >

template<class TYPE >
bool SAMRAI::pdat::FaceDataFactory< TYPE >::fineBoundaryRepresentsVariable (  )  const [inline, virtual]

Return a boolean value indicating how data for the face quantity will be treated on coarse-fine interfaces. This value is passed into the constructor. See the FaceVariable<TYPE> class header file for more information.

Implements SAMRAI::hier::PatchDataFactory.

template<class TYPE >
bool SAMRAI::pdat::FaceDataFactory< TYPE >::dataLivesOnPatchBorder (  )  const [inline, virtual]

Return true since the face data index space extends beyond the interior of patches. That is, face data lives on patch borders.

Implements SAMRAI::hier::PatchDataFactory.

template<class TYPE >
bool SAMRAI::pdat::FaceDataFactory< TYPE >::validCopyTo ( const boost::shared_ptr< hier::PatchDataFactory > &  dst_pdf  )  const [inline]

Return whether it is valid to copy this FaceDataFactory to the supplied destination patch data factory. It will return true if dst_pdf is FaceDataFactory and OuterfaceDataFactory, false otherwise.

Precondition:
getDim() == dst_pdf->getDim()

References TBOX_ASSERT_OBJDIM_EQUALITY2.
